verses.content: Juda thlahai hnam an sûng- kuo izir ang peia an chanpuola ruot chu Edom ramri chin simtieng pang, Zin thlalêr tlung rakin, sim tâwp chenin a va nih.
Simtieng panga an ramri chu Tuipui Al tâwp chen, sim sawng likil- kawia inthawkin a nih;
chun Akrabim fena simtieng panin a fe pei a, Zin a va tlung a, chun, Kades-barnea simtieng khan a feh a, Hezron a va tlung a, chun Adara khan a tungin a feh a, Karka a kuolkhum a,
Chun, Azmonah a fe pei a, Aigupta vadungah a suok a; chun, tuisuorietah ramri chu a tâwp a. Chu chu simtieng panga in ramri ding chu nîng a tih.
Chun, saktieng pang ramri chu Tuipui Al, Jordan suo tak chu a nih. Hmartieng pang ramri chu likilkawi, Jordan suoa inthawkin a nih;
chun, ramri chu Beth-hoglaah a tungin a feh a, Beth-araba hmârah a fe pei a; chun, ramri chu Reuben naupa Bohan lunga chun a fe pei a;
chun, ramri chu Akor ruoma inthawkin Debira chun a fe pei a, chun, vadung simtienga um Adum- mima hang fena depa Gilgal tieng panin hmârtieng a fe pei a; chun, ramri chu En-rogelah a suok a nih;

chun, ramri chu Hinnom naupa ruoma Jebus mihai ram sîr simtieng (chu chu Jerusalem a nih) chenin a fe pei a, chun, ramri chu Hinom thlang- tieng panga ruom bula um tlâng sîpah a feh a, chu chu Rephaim hmâr- tieng pang ruom tâwp tak a nih,
chun, ramri chu tlâng sipa in- thawkin Nephtoa vadung tuihai chenin an infetir a; Ephron tlângah khawpuiahai chun a fe pei a; chun, ramri chu Baala-ah (chu chu Kiriath- Jearim a nih) an infetir a;

chun, ramri chu Baala-ah in- thawk chun thlangtieng panga Seir tlâng chenin ân kuol thla nâwk a; hmârtieng panga Jearim (chu chu Kesalon a nih) tlâng hrûlah a fe pei a; Beth-Semesah a suok a, Timnaah a fe pei a;

chun, ramri chu hmârtieng panga Ekron hrûla chun a fe suok a, chun, ramri chu Sikkeronah an infe- tir a; chun, Baala tlângah a fe pei a, Jabneelah a fe thla a, chuongchun, ramri chu tuisuorietah a va tâwp a.
Chun, thlangtieng pang ramri chu tuisuoriet lientak le a kam chin po chu a nih. Chuong ramri chin po chu a nih Juda thlahai an sûngkuo izir ang peia ruot chu.
Jephunne naupa Kaleb chu LALPAIN Josua thu a pêk angin Juda thlahai laia chun chanpuol a siempêk veh a; chu chu Kiriath-arba a nih; (chu chu Hebron an ti bawk a). Arba chu Anak pa a nih.
Kaleb chun chu khuoa inthawk chun Anak naupasalhai pathum Sesai hai, Ahiman hai, Talmai hai, Anak nauhai chu a hnawt suok a.
Chutaka inthawk chun Debira mihai a hang rûn a; a hma chun Debir hming chu Kiriath-sepher a nih.
Kaleb chun, “Tukhawm Kiriath- sepher hang thawh a, hang la thei taphawt chu ka naunu Aksa hi nuhmeiah inneitir ka tih,” a tih a.
Kaleb unau Kenaz naupa Othniel chun a hang lâk a; chuong- chun, a naunu Aksa chu nuhmeiah ân neitir tah a.
Aksa chu Othniel kuom a va tlung chun, ram hni dingin a thlêm a, a sabengtunga inthawk chu a ṭum a; Kaleb chun a kuomah, “Ieng am i dit a?” a lo tih a.
Ama chun, “Mal mi sâwm rawh, simtieng rama i mîn umtir ta si hin chu tui hnâr neihai khawm mi pe sa rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, tui hnâr nei sakhnunghai le tui hnâr nei thlang- hnunghai chu a pêk tah a.
Juda thlahai hnam an sûngkuo izir ang peia an rochan chu hieng hi a nih:
Sim tâwpa Edom ramri va deptu, Juda thlahai hnam khawpui hmawrtawnghai chu Kabzeel, Eder, Jagur,
Kina, Dimona, Adada,
Kedes, Hazor, Ithnan,
Ziph, Telem, Bealoth,
Hazor-Hadatta, Kerioth-hezron, (chu chu Hazor a nih),
Amam, Sema, Molada,
Hazar-gada, Hesmon, Beth- pelet,
Hazar-sual, Beerseba, Biziothia,
Baala, Iim, Ezem,
Eltolad, Kesil, Horma,
Ziklag, Madmanna, Sansanna,
Lebaoth, Silhim, Ain le Rimmon hai hi a nih; khawpui po po chu a sîrvêl khuohai leh sâwmhni pakuo a nih.
Chun, phai ram tienga chun Estaol, Zora, Asna,
Zanoa, En-gannim, Tappua, Enam,
Jarmuth, Adullam, Soko, Azeka,
Saaraim, Adithaim, Gedera le Gederothaim, khawpuihai chu a sîrvêl khuohai leh sâwmpali a nih.
Zenan, Hadasa, Migdal-gad,
Dilean, Mizpe, Joktheel,
Lakis, Bozkath, Eglon,
Kabbon, Lahmam, Kitlis,
Gederoth, Beth-dagon, Naama le Makeda khawpuihai chu a sîrvêl khuohai leh sâwmparuk a nih.
Libna, Ether, Asan,
Iphta, Asna, Nezib,
Keila, Akzib le Maresa, khaw- puihai chu a sîrvêl khuohai leh pakuo a nih.
Ekron le a sîrvêl khuohai le a khaw chînhai chu:
Ekrona inthawka tuisuoriet chen hielin Asdod hrûla umhai po po a khaw chînhai leh.
Asdod le a sîrvêla khuohai le a khaw chînhai chu: Gaza le a sîrvêl khuohai le a khaw chînhai chu; Aigupta vadung le tuisuoriet lien le a kam chenin.
Chun, tlâng ram tieng chun Samir, Jattir, Soko,
Danna, Kiriath-sanna (chu chu Debir a nih);
Anab, Estemo, Anim,
Gosen, Holon, Gilo, khawpuihai chu a khaw chînhai leh sâwmpakhat a nih.
Arab, Duma, Esan,
Janim, Beth-tappua, Apheka,
Humta, Kiriath-arba (chu chu Hebron a nih) le Zior; khawpuihai chu a khaw chînhai leh pakuo a nih.
Maon, Karmel, Ziph, Jutta,
Jezreel, Jokdeam, Zanoa,
Kain, Gibea le Timna, khaw- puihai chu a khaw chînhai leh sâwm a nih.
Halhul, Beth-zur, Gedor;
Maarath, Beth-anoth, Eltekon, khawpuihai chu a khaw chînhai leh paruk a nih.
Kiriath-baal (chu chu Kiriath- Jearim) a nih; Rabba dâm, khawpui- hai chu a khaw chînhai leh khaw hni a nih.
Thlalêr tienga chun Beth- araba, Middin le Sekaka,
Nibsan, Machi khawpui le, En-gedi, khawpuihai chu a khaw chînhai leh paruk a nih.
Jerusalem khuoa mi Jebus mihai ruok chu Juda thlahaiin an hnawt suok thei nawh a: chuongchun, Jebus mihai chu Juda thlahai leh tuchen hin Jerusalemah an la um hmunkhat ta zing a nih.
